author: Special Correspondent
text:
Watchtowers will be set up on the shores of Nagore keep an eye on the crowd in Nagore during the ‘kanthuri’ festival, said S. Palanisamy, District Collector.

Addressing the officials after inspecting the Dargah where the annual ‘kanthuri’ festival commences on Thursday, the Collector said special divers from the Fire Service and Rescue Department and the Fisheries Department would be drafted till March 23. The Collector said special arrangements would be made for supplying drinking water and other amenities. He advised the officials of Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation to ensure uninterrupted power supply to Nagore and surrounding areas as a large congregation of devotees was expected to throng the town. Special medical teams would be constituted to provide first aid.

Johnson, Municipal Commissioner, accompanied the Collector.
title: Watchtowers to be set up for Kanthuri festival
